about_the_game:
Skillet is a delicious arena battler where everything is flammable and bouncy. You cannot directly attack anyone but you can definitely nudge someone into harm's way. Survive against friends and foes in five game modes from the comfort of your own kitchen.

Built as an open-source game in Godot Engine, Skillet is completely customizable by the community and uses Steam Workshop to easily share modifications. You can read more about it on the website.



The kitchen is your playground. Be the last player standing in one of five game modes:

Trial By Fire
Avoid being ignited by various hazards while knocking friends into said hazards. Accidentally.

Hot Potato
The floor is lava. Well, boiling hot oil. Jump for every melting platform you can while you can.

Pass The Torch
The Match is "it" and coming for you. Get tagged to become yet another Match, spreading the flames.

Fire-Water-Sponge
Fire burns sponge, sponge absorbs water, water douses fire. You get how this works.

Gumbo
A little bit of everything and a boss-fight cherry on top.



Unlock and trade a variety of skins and cosmetics with friends; even get some for just having Godot Engine in your Steam library or owning other Godot-made games like Brotato, Chillquarium, District Panic, Drift, Lila's Sky Ark, Resolutiion, Satryn Deluxe, Virtual Cottage, WindowKill, and more.

You can also create your own skins and cosmetics then upload them to Steam Workshop to share with friends. Download templates from Skillet's asset repository on Github or Steam Workshop itself.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: If you like music
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: If you like music
